metadata.title: CVE-2010-0280 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Array index error in Jan Eric Kyprianidis lib3ds 1.x, as used in GoogleSketchUp 7.x before 7.1 M2, allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory corruption) or possibly execute arbitrary code via craftedstructures in a 3DS file, probably related to mesh.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-0280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lib3ds-1-3 - 1.3.0-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lib3ds package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-8').
